remarks: Scalar multiplication in a free module at a coordinate.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.)
statement:
frlmvscaval.y $e |- Y = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
frlmvscaval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
frlmvscaval.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
frlmvscaval.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
frlmvscaval.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. K ) $.
frlmvscaval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
frlmvscaval.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. I ) $.
frlmvscaval.v $e |- .xb = ( .s ` Y ) $.
frlmvscaval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
frlmvscaval $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A .xb X ) ` J ) = ( A .x. ( X ` J ) ) ) $.
